    • play中VirtualFile的使用

      声明为VirtualFile的play中的字段 
      限定符和类型 字段和说明

      Main routes file

      限定符和类型 字段和说明
      static Set<VirtualFile> Play.confs
      The loaded configuration files
      static List<VirtualFile> Play.javaPath
      All paths to search for Java files
      static Map<String,VirtualFile> Play.modules
      Modules
      static Map<String,VirtualFile> Play.modulesRoutes
      Plugin routes files
      static List<VirtualFile> Play.roots
      All paths to search for files
      static List<VirtualFile> Play.templatesPath
      All paths to search for templates files
